channel.title: Posts on Taurus Tiny
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Taurus Tiny

item.title: nginx代理wordpress重定向过多
item.description: 修改wp-config.php 🔗$_SERVER['HTTPS'] = 'on'; define('FORCE_SSL_LOGIN', true); define('FORCE_SSL_ADMIN', true); 或者 🔗//Begin Really Simple SSL Server variable fix $_SERVER["HTTPS"] = "on"; //END Really Simple SSL

item.title: Nginx
item.description: 1.语法：nginx -s signal 🔗可执行文件支持的signal信号 🔗 stop 快速停止 reload 重新加载配置文件 quit 平滑停止 reopen 重新打开日志文件 nginx -s quit nginx -s reload signal
